verses.text: \w Hear|strong="H8085"\w* ye \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* hath \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* \w concerning|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H0834"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

\w Thus|strong="H3541"\w* saith \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*: \w Learn|strong="H3925"\w* \w not|strong="H0408"\w* \w according|strong="H0413"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w ways|strong="H1870"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Gentiles|strong="H1471"\w*: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H0408"\w* \w not|strong="H0408"\w* afraid \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w signs|strong="H0226"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w*, \w which|strong="H1471"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* heathens fear:

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* laws \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w are|strong="H3027"\w* \w vain|strong="H1892"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w works|strong="H4639"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* workman hath \w cut|strong="H3772"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w tree|strong="H6086"\w* \w out|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w forest|strong="H3293"\w* \w with|strong="H3027"\w* \w an|strong="H3588"\w* axe.

\w He|strong="H3808"\w* hath decked \w it|strong="H3808"\w* \w with|strong="H2091"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* \w and|strong="H3701"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*: \w he|strong="H3808"\w* hath \w put|strong="H2388"\w* \w it|strong="H3808"\w* \w together|strong="H2388"\w* \w with|strong="H2091"\w* \w nails|strong="H4548"\w* \w and|strong="H3701"\w* \w hammers|strong="H4717"\w*, \w that|strong="H3808"\w* \w it|strong="H3808"\w* \w may|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* fall asunder.

\w They|strong="H1992"\w* \w are|strong="H1992"\w* framed \w after|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* likeness \w of|strong="H0369"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w palm|strong="H8560"\w* \w tree|strong="H8560"\w*, \w and|strong="H1696"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w speak|strong="H1696"\w*: \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w must|strong="H1571"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w carried|strong="H5375"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w removed|strong="H5375"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w cannot|strong="H3808"\w* \w go|strong="H3190"\w*. \w Therefore|strong="H1571"\w*, \w fear|strong="H3372"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w can|strong="H0369"\w* \w neither|strong="H3808"\w* \w do|strong="H3190"\w* \w evil|strong="H7489"\w* \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w good|strong="H3190"\w*.

\w There|strong="H0369"\w* \w is|strong="H0369"\w* \w none|strong="H0369"\w* \w like|strong="H3644"\w* \w to|strong="H0369"\w* thee, \w O|strong="H0859"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*: thou art \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w is|strong="H0369"\w* thy \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w might|strong="H1369"\w*.

\w Who|strong="H4310"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w fear|strong="H3372"\w* thee, \w O|strong="H4310"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*? \w for|strong="H3588"\w* thine \w is|strong="H0369"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* glory: \w among|strong="H4310"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w wise|strong="H2450"\w* \w men|strong="H2450"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w in|strong="H4428"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w kingdoms|strong="H4438"\w* \w there|strong="H0369"\w* \w is|strong="H0369"\w* \w none|strong="H0369"\w* \w like|strong="H3644"\w* unto thee.

\w They|strong="H1931"\w* \w shall|strong="H1931"\w* \w all|strong="H0259"\w* proved \w together|strong="H0259"\w* \w to|strong="H0259"\w* \w be|strong="H1931"\w* senseless \w and|strong="H6086"\w* \w foolish|strong="H3688"\w*: \w the|strong="H1931"\w* doctrine \w of|strong="H6086"\w* their \w vanity|strong="H1892"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w wood|strong="H6086"\w*.

\w Silver|strong="H3701"\w* \w spread|strong="H7554"\w* \w into|strong="H0935"\w* \w plates|strong="H7554"\w* \w is|strong="H3027"\w* \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* \w from|strong="H0935"\w* Tharsis, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* \w from|strong="H0935"\w* Ophaz: \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w work|strong="H4639"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* artificer, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* coppersmith: \w violet|strong="H8504"\w* \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w purple|strong="H0713"\w* \w is|strong="H3027"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w clothing|strong="H3830"\w*: \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w these|strong="H3605"\w* \w things|strong="H3605"\w* \w are|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w work|strong="H4639"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* artificers.

\w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w true|strong="H0571"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*: \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w living|strong="H2416"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w everlasting|strong="H5769"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, \w at|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w wrath|strong="H7110"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w tremble|strong="H7493"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* able \w to|strong="H3068"\w* abide \w his|strong="H3068"\w* threatening.

\w Thus|strong="H1836"\w* \w then|strong="H1768"\w* shall \w you|strong="H1768"\w* \w say|strong="H0560"\w* \w to|strong="H0560"\w* \w them|strong="H0560"\w*: \w The|strong="H1768"\w* \w gods|strong="H0426"\w* \w that|strong="H1768"\w* have \w not|strong="H3809"\w* \w made|strong="H5648"\w* \w heaven|strong="H8065"\w* \w and|strong="H8065"\w* \w earth|strong="H0772"\w*, let \w them|strong="H0560"\w* \w perish|strong="H0007"\w* \w from|strong="H4481"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w earth|strong="H0772"\w*, \w and|strong="H8065"\w* \w from|strong="H4481"\w* among \w those|strong="H1768"\w* places \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w are|strong="H1768"\w* \w under|strong="H8460"\w* \w heaven|strong="H8065"\w*.

\w He|strong="H6213"\w* \w that|strong="H0776"\w* maketh \w the|strong="H0776"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* \w by|strong="H3559"\w* \w his|strong="H3559"\w* \w power|strong="H3581"\w*, \w that|strong="H0776"\w* prepareth \w the|strong="H0776"\w* \w world|strong="H8398"\w* \w by|strong="H3559"\w* \w his|strong="H3559"\w* \w wisdom|strong="H2451"\w*, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* stretcheth \w out|strong="H5186"\w* \w the|strong="H0776"\w* \w heavens|strong="H8064"\w* \w by|strong="H3559"\w* \w his|strong="H3559"\w* knowledge.

\w At|strong="H7307"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* \w he|strong="H6213"\w* giveth \w a|strong="H5414"\w* \w multitude|strong="H1995"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* \w in|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w*, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* lifteth \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* clouds \w from|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* ends \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*: \w he|strong="H6213"\w* maketh \w lightnings|strong="H1300"\w* \w for|strong="H0776"\w* \w rain|strong="H4306"\w*, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* bringeth \w for|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w wind|strong="H7307"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w treasures|strong="H0214"\w*.

\w Every|strong="H3605"\w* \w man|strong="H0120"\w* \w is|strong="H3605"\w* \w become|strong="H3001"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* fool \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w knowledge|strong="H1847"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* artist \w is|strong="H3605"\w* confounded \w in|strong="H3808"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w graven|strong="H6459"\w* \w idol|strong="H6459"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w what|strong="H1847"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* hath cast \w is|strong="H3605"\w* \w false|strong="H8267"\w*, \w and|strong="H0120"\w* \w there|strong="H3605"\w* \w is|strong="H3605"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* \w in|strong="H3808"\w* \w them|strong="H3588"\w*.

\w They|strong="H1992"\w* \w are|strong="H1992"\w* \w vain|strong="H1892"\w* \w things|strong="H4639"\w* \w and|strong="H1892"\w* \w a|strong="H6256"\w* ridiculous \w work|strong="H4639"\w*: \w in|strong="H4639"\w* \w the|strong="H6256"\w* \w time|strong="H6256"\w* \w of|strong="H6256"\w* \w their|strong="H1992"\w* visitation \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w shall|strong="H4639"\w* \w perish|strong="H0006"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w portion|strong="H2506"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w like|strong="H3808"\w* \w these|strong="H0428"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w formed|strong="H3335"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w things|strong="H0428"\w*: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w rod|strong="H7626"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w*: \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w*.

\w Gather|strong="H0622"\w* \w up|strong="H3427"\w* thy shame \w out|strong="H3427"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0776"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, thou \w that|strong="H0776"\w* dwellest \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w a|strong="H0776"\w* \w siege|strong="H4692"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w thus|strong="H3541"\w* saith \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*: \w Behold|strong="H2005"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* cast away far \w off|strong="H0853"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w at|strong="H3427"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* \w time|strong="H6471"\w*: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* afflict \w them|strong="H1992"\w*, \w so|strong="H4616"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w may|strong="H0776"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w found|strong="H4672"\w*.

\w Woe|strong="H0188"\w* \w is|strong="H2088"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w destruction|strong="H7667"\w*, \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w wound|strong="H4347"\w* \w is|strong="H2088"\w* \w very|strong="H2088"\w* grievous. \w But|strong="H0389"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Truly|strong="H0389"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w is|strong="H2088"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* own evil, \w and|strong="H2088"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w will|strong="H0589"\w* \w bear|strong="H5375"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w My|strong="H3605"\w* \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* \w is|strong="H0369"\w* \w laid|strong="H3318"\w* \w waste|strong="H7703"\w*, \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w cords|strong="H4340"\w* \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w broken|strong="H5423"\w*: \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w gone|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w from|strong="H3318"\w* \w me|strong="H3318"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w they|strong="H3605"\w* \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w not|strong="H0369"\w*: \w there|strong="H0369"\w* \w is|strong="H0369"\w* \w none|strong="H0369"\w* \w to|strong="H0369"\w* \w stretch|strong="H5186"\w* \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w tent|strong="H0168"\w* \w any|strong="H3605"\w* \w more|strong="H5750"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w to|strong="H0369"\w* \w set|strong="H6965"\w* \w up|strong="H6965"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w curtains|strong="H3407"\w*.

\w Because|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* pastors \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w done|strong="H3605"\w* foolishly, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w sought|strong="H1875"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*: \w therefore|strong="H3651"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w understood|strong="H7919"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w flock|strong="H4830"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w scattered|strong="H6327"\w*.

\w Behold|strong="H2009"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w sound|strong="H6963"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w a|strong="H7760"\w* \w noise|strong="H6963"\w* cometh, \w a|strong="H7760"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w commotion|strong="H7494"\w* \w out|strong="H0935"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w north|strong="H6828"\w*: \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w make|strong="H7760"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* Juda \w a|strong="H7760"\w* desert, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w a|strong="H7760"\w* \w dwelling|strong="H4583"\w* \w for|strong="H0776"\w* dragons.

\w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w*: \w neither|strong="H3808"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w in|strong="H1980"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w to|strong="H1980"\w* \w walk|strong="H1980"\w*, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w to|strong="H1980"\w* \w direct|strong="H3559"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w steps|strong="H6806"\w*.

\w Correct|strong="H3256"\w* \w me|strong="H3256"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w but|strong="H0389"\w* \w yet|strong="H0389"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* judgement: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H0408"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* fury, \w lest|strong="H6435"\w* thou \w bring|strong="H4591"\w* \w me|strong="H3256"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w nothing|strong="H0408"\w*.

\w Pour|strong="H8210"\w* \w out|strong="H8210"\w* thy indignation \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w known|strong="H3045"\w* thee, \w and|strong="H0398"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* provinces \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* thy \w name|strong="H8034"\w*: \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* \w eaten|strong="H0398"\w* \w up|strong="H5921"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*, \w and|strong="H0398"\w* \w devoured|strong="H0398"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H0398"\w* \w consumed|strong="H0398"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H0398"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* \w destroyed|strong="H3615"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* glory.
